html: The Committee has APPROVED the #RaisetheWage Act (28Y -20N)! text:
The Committee has APPROVED the #RaisetheWage Act (28Y -20N)!
Gradually increases the minimum wage to $15 by 2024

html: It contains $1.6b in border security measures including: $563m to reduce a backlog of immigration cases. $524m for ports of entry to facilitate lawful entries and trade. $527m for Central American countries to improve security and economic stability. $0 for a border wall.
text:
It contains $1.6b in border security measures including:
$563m to reduce a backlog of immigration cases.
$524m for ports of entry to facilitate lawful entries and trade.
$527m for Central American countries to improve security and economic stability.
$0 for a border wall.

html: In my district, what we want instead is to take a unified approach to ensuring quality, affordable healthcare, protecting Social Security and Medicare, creating more good-paying job opportunities, and addressing the gun violence epidemic that is devastating our communities.
